titlestmt.titleproper: Alida B. Geoffrey collection of valentines 1880-1930
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Alida B. Geoffrey collection of valentines

bioghist.p: Alida B. Geoffrey was a member of the Bryn Mawr College class of 1950. She collected valentines and other greeting cards.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of Valentine's Day cards from the late 19th and early 20th century. Also included are several St. Patrick's Day and Easter cards and photocopies of articles on collecting valentines. In total there are roughly 100 cards.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
